items.sentence: Tom abandoned the project because he didn\'t have enough money.
Tom doesn\'t drink much beer, but he sure drinks a lot of wine.
Tom doesn\'t feel like taking a walk with his dog this morning.
Tom doesn\'t know the difference between geography and geology.
It\'s difficult to help people who can\'t admit they need help.
I\'m surprised that you didn\'t know that Tom got into Harvard.
Tom is going to sleep in my room, and I\'ll sleep on the couch.
Tom is likely to end up in prison if he doesn\'t straighten up.
Tom is not the only one who thinks it\'s a bad idea to do that.
Tom is one of the most interesting guys I\'ve ever worked with.
